ingredients: 8 medium apples, cut into slices without peel
instructions: Mix together the apples, sugar, cinnamon and salt and place in a greased medium pan.
In another bowl, mix the oatmeal, flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda and after mixing
Pour the mixture over the apples.
Place in the oven at 180 degrees and place the pan for 50-60 minutes until the apples are soft and everything is brown
